q.name: Quran Recitation
q.msg: Hey! Behairy, Do you hear me? I hope you're with me on the line! it's time for quran! you have to get up now and do it. Hey Ahmad! leave everything in your hand right now. it's time for Quran recitation.

k.name: A swim in heaven
k.msg: Don't you wish to swim in heaven? I recently caught a heaven on Earth if you're interested,I think you will like it. It's all about learning more about your relegion!

w.name: Work
w.msg: Hey, Ahmed! it's time to do some work!
